actions.name: AssignAdminPermissionsToUser
actions.description: Grants permission to add AWS Supply Chain administrator permission to federated user

actions.name: CreateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: CreateSSOApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create IAM Identity Center application for a AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: DeleteInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: DeleteSSOApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to delete IAM Identity Center application of the AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: DescribeInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of an AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: ListAdminUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Supply Chain administrators of an instance

actions.name: ListInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to view the AWS Supply Chain instances associated with an AWS account

actions.name: RemoveAdminPermissionsForUser
actions.description: Grants permission to remove AWS Supply Chain administrator permission from federated user

actions.name: UpdateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Supply Chain instance
